meaningMnemonic:
A <kanji>big</kanji> <kanji>voice</kanji> is a <vocabulary>loud voice</vocabulary>!

大声 usually just describes talking in a <vocabulary>big voice</vocabulary>, but it can also refer to shouting depending on the situation.
readingMnemonic: The reading for 声 is ごえ (rendaku'd version of the reading you know: こえ). The reading for 大 is the kun'yomi reading, like with the word 大きい (おおきい). Just imagine a loud voice saying "おお！."
